trans-unit.source: Represents a panel in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un pannello in un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> control replaces and adds functionality to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control of previous versions, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
trans-unit.target: Sebbene il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"> </xref> controllo sostituisce e aggiunge la funzionalità per il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> controllo delle versioni precedenti, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> viene mantenuto per compatibilità con le versioni precedenti e un utilizzo futuro, se si sceglie.

trans-unit.source: A StatusBarPanel represents an individual panel in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto StatusBarPanel rappresenta un singolo pannello nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>

trans-unit.source: A StatusBarPanel can contain text and/or an icon that can be used to reflect the status of an application.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto StatusBarPanel può contenere testo e/o un'icona che può essere utilizzata in modo da riflettere lo stato di un'applicazione.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>, accessible through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control, to retrieve, add, or remove an individual StatusBarPanel.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>, accessibile tramite la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controllo, per recuperare, aggiungere o rimuovere un singolo oggetto StatusBarPanel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>

trans-unit.source: The StatusBarPanel provides properties that enable you to modify the display behavior of a panel within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto StatusBarPanel fornisce le proprietà che consentono di modificare il comportamento di visualizzazione di un pannello in un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> property to display an icon within a panel.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>proprietà per visualizzare un'icona all'interno di un pannello.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to provide a graphical representation of state in an application.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà può essere utilizzata per fornire una rappresentazione grafica dello stato in un'applicazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> property enables you to specify how text and/or an icon is aligned within the panel.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>proprietà consente di specificare la modalità di allineamento testo e/o un'icona all'interno del pannello.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: To ensure that your panel is sized properly to fit the text of the panel, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> property to automatically resize the panel to fit the text of the panel or to fill the remaining space within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: Per garantire che il pannello viene ridimensionato in modo corretto per adattarsi al testo del pannello, è possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>proprietà per il ridimensionamento automatico per adattare il testo del pannello o per riempire il rimanente spazio all'interno di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A> property enables you to specify a minimum width for the panel to ensure that it does not get smaller than the data it is intended to display.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A>proprietà consente di specificare una larghezza minima per il pannello garantire che le dimensioni siano inferiori rispetto ai dati che si intende visualizzare.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control is typically used to display Help information or state information about your application.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controllo viene in genere utilizzato per visualizzare le informazioni della Guida o sullo stato relative all'applicazione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: Often, it is important to display additional information about data that is presented in a panel.
trans-unit.target: Spesso, è importante visualizzare informazioni aggiuntive sui dati presentati in un pannello.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A> property to display information whenever the mouse pointer rests on a panel.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>proprietà per visualizzare le informazioni ogni volta che il puntatore del mouse si sofferma su un pannello.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control is typically used to display textual information, you can also provide your own type of display to a StatusBarPanel.
trans-unit.target: Sebbene il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controllo è in genere utilizzato per visualizzare informazioni di testo, è possibile fornire anche un nuovo tipo di visualizzazione per un oggetto StatusBarPanel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> property enables you to specify how the StatusBarPanel will be drawn.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>proprietà consente di specificare come verrà disegnata il StatusBarPanel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> property is used to display the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> property (and an icon, if specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> property).
trans-unit.target: Per impostazione predefinita, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>proprietà viene utilizzata per visualizzare il valore della <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A>proprietà (e un'icona, se specificato nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>proprietà).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>, you can draw your own information into the panel.
trans-unit.target: Se la proprietà è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>, è possibile inserire le proprie informazioni nel pannello.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>

trans-unit.source: You can use this feature to draw a progress bar or an animated icon in the panel.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questa funzionalità per creare un indicatore di stato o un'icona animata nel pannello.

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance of the StatusBarPanel class, the read/write properties are set to initial values.
trans-unit.target: Quando si crea un'istanza della classe StatusBarPanel, le proprietà di lettura/scrittura sono impostate sui valori iniziali.

trans-unit.source: For a list of these values, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Per un elenco di questi valori, vedere il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.%23ctor%2A>costruttore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, the following read/write properties are set to initial values.
trans-unit.target: Quando si crea un'istanza di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, le seguenti proprietà di lettura/scrittura sono impostate sui valori iniziali.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A>|10| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A>|A zero-length string.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>|A zero-length string.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A>|100| You can change the value for any of these properties through a separate call to the property.
trans-unit.target: | Proprietà | Il valore iniziale | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment>| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle>| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>| `null`| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A>|&10; | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A>| Una stringa di lunghezza zero. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>| Una stringa di lunghezza zero. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A>|&100; | È possibile modificare il valore per una di queste proprietà tramite una chiamata distinta per la proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of text and icons within the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'allineamento del testo e icone all'interno del pannello della barra di stato.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to horizontally align the text and/or icon assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> property within the borders of the panel.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questa proprietà per l'allineamento orizzontale del testo e/o icona assegnata al <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>proprietà all'interno dei bordi del pannello.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>

trans-unit.source: Text and icons can be aligned to the left, right, or center of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Testo e icone possono essere allineate a sinistra, a destra o al centro del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: There is no way to independently position an icon within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Non è possibile posizionare in modo indipendente un'icona all'interno di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: For example, you cannot position an icon to the left side of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> while aligning the text on the right side.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile posizionare un'icona a sinistra del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>e allineare il testo a destra.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The icon is always positioned to the left side of the text regardless of how the text is aligned.
trans-unit.target: L'icona viene sempre posizionato sul lato sinistro del testo indipendentemente dalla modalità di allineamento del testo.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is not a member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Il valore assegnato alla proprietà non è membro il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"> </xref> enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the status bar panel is automatically resized.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se il pannello della barra di stato viene ridimensionato automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> have precedence over those panels set to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>gli oggetti impostati su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>hanno la precedenza sui pannelli impostati la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>valore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize></xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> that has its AutoSize property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> is shortened if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> with the AutoSize property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> requires that space.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>con la proprietà AutoSize impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>vengono ridotte se una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>con la proprietà AutoSize impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>richiede che lo spazio.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: You can use AutoSize to ensure that the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> are properly displayed in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control that contains more than one panel.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare la proprietà AutoSize per garantire che il contenuto di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>vengono visualizzati correttamente un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controllo che contiene più di un pannello.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want a panel that contains text to adjust automatically to the amount of text it is displaying (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>), while another panel on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> that displays an owner-drawn progress bar would need to be a fixed size (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>).
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è necessario un pannello che contiene il testo per regolare automaticamente alla quantità di testo visualizzata (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>), mentre un altro pannello del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>che mostra un indicatore di stato disegnato dal proprietario dovrebbe essere una dimensione fissa (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is not a member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Il valore assegnato alla proprietà non è membro il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"> </xref> enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: Begins the initialization of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Avvia l'inizializzazione di un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to start the initialization of a component that is used on a form or used by another component.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene utilizzato per avviare l'inizializzazione di un componente utilizzato in un form o da un altro componente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A> method ends the initialization.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A>metodo termina l'inizializzazione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using the BeginInit and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A> methods prevents the control from being used before it is fully initialized.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzo di BeginInit e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A>metodi impedisce il controllo venga utilizzato prima che il completamento dell'inizializzazione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta lo stile del bordo del pannello della barra di stato.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to differentiate a panel from other panels in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questa proprietà per differenziare un pannello da altri pannelli in un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is not a member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Il valore assegnato alla proprietà non è membro il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"> </xref> enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia le risorse non gestite usate dal <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref> e facoltativamente rilascia le risorse gestite.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato dal metodo pubblico `Dispose()` (metodo) e <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`richiama il metodo protetto `Dispose(Boolean)` metodo con il `disposing` parametro impostato su `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>richiama `Dispose` con `disposing` impostato su `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando il `disposing` parametro `true`, questo metodo rilascia tutte le risorse utilizzate dagli oggetti gestiti da questo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>riferimenti.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo richiama il `Dispose()` metodo di ciascun oggetto cui viene fatto riferimento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per rilasciare le risorse gestite e non gestite. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per rilasciare solo le risorse non gestite.

trans-unit.source: Ends the initialization of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Termina l'inizializzazione di un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to end the initialization of a component that is used by another component.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene utilizzato per terminare l'inizializzazione di un componente che viene utilizzato da un altro componente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A> method starts the initialization.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A>metodo avvia l'inizializzazione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A> and EndInit methods prevents the control from being used before it is fully initialized.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzo di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A>EndInit metodi e impedisce il controllo venga utilizzato prima che il completamento dell'inizializzazione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the icon to display within the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'icona da visualizzare all'interno del pannello della barra di stato.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to display an icon that represents the state of your application or a process within your application.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questa proprietà per visualizzare un'icona che rappresenta lo stato dell'applicazione o un processo all'interno dell'applicazione.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can display an icon in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> to indicate whether a file save operation is in progress or complete.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile visualizzare un'icona in una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>per indicare se l'operazione di salvataggio di un file è in corso o è stata completata.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > There is no way to independently position an icon within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Non è possibile posizionare in modo indipendente un'icona all'interno di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: For example, you cannot position an icon to the left side of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> while aligning the text on the right side using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile posizionare un'icona a sinistra del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>e allineare il testo sul lato destro utilizzando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The icon is always positioned to the left side of the panel's text regardless of how the text is aligned.
trans-unit.target: L'icona viene sempre posizionato sul lato sinistro del testo del pannello indipendentemente dalla modalità di allineamento del testo.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref> that represents the icon to display in the panel.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"> </xref> che rappresenta l'icona da visualizzare nel pannello.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum allowed width of the status bar panel within the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la larghezza minima consentita del pannello della barra di stato all'interno di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The MinWidth property is used when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> to prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> from automatically resizing to a width that is too small.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà MinWidth viene utilizzata quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>per impedire il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>dal ridimensionamento automatico larghezza troppo piccolo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>, the MinWidth property is automatically set to the same value as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>proprietà è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>, la proprietà MinWidth viene impostata automaticamente sullo stesso valore come il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The minimum width, in pixels, of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La larghezza minima, in pixel, del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A value less than 0 is assigned to the property.
trans-unit.target: Per la proprietà viene assegnato un valore minore di 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name to apply to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il nome da applicare per il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Name property corresponds to the key for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà nome corrisponde alla chiave per uno <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control that hosts the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> controllo che contiene il pannello della barra di stato.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> is contained within.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questa proprietà per determinare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>che controllano un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>è contenuto all'interno.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects are added to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>gli oggetti vengono aggiunti a un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controllo chiamando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A>metodo della <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar></xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control is accessible through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controllo è accessibile tramite la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> that contains the panel.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> che contiene il pannello.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta lo stile del pannello della barra di stato.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to indicate whether a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> displays text or whether the panel is managed as an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questa proprietà per indicare se un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>Visualizza il testo o se il pannello viene gestito come un proprietario <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: To determine when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> needs to be drawn, create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: Per determinare quando un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>deve essere disegnato, creare un gestore eventi per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem>evento del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> passed as a parameter to an event handler of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event enables you to determine which panel needs to be drawn.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs>passato come parametro a un gestore eventi del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem>evento consente di determinare il pannello da disegnare.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> also provides a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object you can use to perform drawing tasks on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs>Fornisce anche un <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>oggetto che è possibile utilizzare per eseguire attività di disegno in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is not a member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Il valore assegnato alla proprietà non è membro il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"> </xref> enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that contains data about the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un oggetto che contiene i dati relativi il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that contains data about the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Object>che contiene i dati relativi il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il testo del pannello della barra di stato.

trans-unit.source: This property represents the text that is displayed when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà rappresenta il testo che viene visualizzato quando la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>proprietà è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to display information about your application in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questa proprietà per visualizzare le informazioni sull'applicazione in un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the Text property to display Help information when the user moves the mouse over a menu or to display the name and location of a file that is opened in an application.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile utilizzare la proprietà di testo per visualizzare le informazioni della Guida quando l'utente sposta il puntatore del mouse su un menu o per visualizzare il nome e percorso di un file che viene aperto in un'applicazione.

trans-unit.source: To align the text within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per allineare il testo all'interno di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The text displayed in the panel.
trans-unit.target: Il testo visualizzato nel pannello.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets ToolTip text associated with the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il testo della descrizione comando associato al pannello della barra di stato.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to display additional information in a ToolTip when the mouse pointer rests on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questa proprietà per visualizzare informazioni aggiuntive in una descrizione comando quando il puntatore del mouse si sofferma su un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can display a ToolTip that provides data transfer speed for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> that displays the status of a file transfer.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile visualizzare una descrizione comando che fornisce la velocità di trasferimento dei dati per un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>che visualizza lo stato di un trasferimento di file.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: To display ToolTips for other controls in your application, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> control.
trans-unit.target: Per visualizzare le descrizioni comandi per gli altri controlli nell'applicazione, utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip text for the panel.
trans-unit.target: Testo della descrizione comando per il pannello.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a string that contains information about the panel.
trans-unit.target: Recupera una stringa che contiene informazioni sul pannello.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that contains the class name for the control and the text it contains.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce una stringa che contiene il nome della classe per il controllo e il contenuto del testo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the status bar panel within the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la larghezza del Pannello di barra di stato all'interno di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The Width property always reflects the actual width of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> and cannot be smaller than the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà Width riflette sempre la larghezza effettiva di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>e non può essere minore di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: To automatically resize the width of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> to the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per ridimensionare automaticamente la larghezza della <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>al contenuto del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, è possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La larghezza, in pixel, del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The width specified is less than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth*> property.
trans-unit.target: La larghezza specificata è inferiore al valore del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth*>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth*>
